ISSUE.TITLE: Error forging a SQL request on page eventorganization/conferenceorboothattendee_list.php
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Bug Error forging a SQL request on page eventorganization/conferenceorboothattendee_list.php ### Dolibarr Version 20.0 ### Environment PHP n/a ### Environment Database n/a ### Steps to reproduce the behavior and expected behavior 1. Enable module event organization 2. Create a new project and select "used for event organization" 3. Navigate to the project and select card "event organization". 4. Select "participants" 5. You should now be on the page eventorganization/conferenceorboothattendee_list.php and see the error message "Error forging a SQL request" ### Attached files

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix search in member list (lastname and company)
